short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your Basecamp tasks tags to shine, oh yeah!
short.es: Haz que tus tareas en Basecamp brillen, oh yeah!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basecamp does not allow visual labels in task names. These TAGs are useful, for example, if you want to use status labels to be able to see the status of all of your tasks at a glance, without having to move them to a sub-todo list and without having to enter the task itself. 

Basecamp Beautifier does that, trying to customize the task view so it can be adjusted to your needs in a simple and fast way. Also, by selecting a featured tag in you configuration, Basecamp will show how many tasks do you have with the featured selected tag.
